title: Radiant Diamond Peacock Haram with Matching Jhumkas
materials: Emerald. Finished with a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisitely crafted Haram features a double peacock motif pendant, symbolizing beauty and prosperity. The intricate diamond setting showcases a delicate floral and paisley design, adorned with lustrous, perfectly spherical cultured pearl drops. The matching Jhumkas echo the peacock motif, with pearl drops enhancing their elegant sway. The necklace utilizes a unique interconnected diamond setting for enhanced flexibility and comfort. Traditional South Indian design with a contemporary flair.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (muhurtham)
description: This magnificent set embodies the pinnacle of South Indian bridal jewelry. The radiant diamonds, combined with the richness of gold and the auspicious peacock motif, make it a timeless heirloom piece. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and value. An investment in tradition and elegance, crafted for generations to cherish.
